RESOURCE.NAME: Groovy scripting PR
RESOURCE.COMMENT: Runs a Groovy script as a processing resource

PARAMETER.NAME: encoding
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Character encoding used to read the script

PARAMETER.NAME: scriptURL
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Location of the Groovy script that will be run for each document

PARAMETER.NAME: scriptParams
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Optional additional parameters to pass to the script.

PARAMETER.NAME: corpus
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The corpus containing the document to process

RESOURCE.NAME: Scriptable Controller
RESOURCE.COMMENT: A controller whose execution strategy is controlled by a Groovy script

PARAMETER.NAME: corpus
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The corpus containing the document to process

RESOURCE.NAME: Control Script
RESOURCE.COMMENT: Editor for the Groovy script controlling a scriptable controller

RESOURCE.NAME: Script Editor
RESOURCE.COMMENT: Editor for the Groovy script behind this PR
